mapper.select: SELECT id,platform,system,job,tag,tag_type,1 sort FROM uds_job_tags WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job=#{job} AND tag_type=#{tag_type} AND is_enable=1 UNION ALL SELECT id,platform,system,job,tag,tag_type,2 sort FROM uds_job_tags WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system=#{system} AND job="*" AND tag_type=#{tag_type} AND is_enable=1 UNION ALL SELECT id,platform,system,job,tag,tag_type,3 sort FROM uds_job_tags WHERE platform=#{platform} AND system="*" AND job="*" AND tag_type=#{tag_type} AND is_enable=1;
